channel.title: temperature response on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in temperature response on funPlantGenes

item.title: BnaFTA2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: BnaA02g12130D Gene Symbol: BnaFTA2 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Brassica napus Functional Descriptions: We revealed that BnaFTA2 plays a major role in temperature-dependent flowering initiation.

item.title: CaAGL8
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CaAGL8 Gene Name: Agamous-like MADS-box protein AGL8-like protein Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: MADS-box protein AGL8 interacts with chromatin-remodelling component SWC4 to activate thermotolerance and environment-dependent immunity in pepper.

item.title: CabZIP63
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: CA01g21080 Gene Symbol: CabZIP63 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: Pepper CabZIP63 acts as a positive regulator during Ralstonia solanacearum or high temperature–high humidity challenge in a positive feedback loop with CaWRKY40.

item.title: CaMLO1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Capana08g000221 Gene Symbol: CaMLO1 Gene Name: mildew resistance locus O 1 Genome: Genome assembly Pepper Zunla 1 Ref_v1.

item.title: CaPUB21
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Capana08g000105 Gene Symbol: CaPUB21 Gene Name: U-box domain-containing protein 21 Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: CaPUB21 acted positively in immunity at 28 °C but negatively at 37 °C.

item.title: CaWRKY6
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CaWRKY6 Gene Name: WRKY transcription factor 6 Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: CaWRKY6 transcriptionally activates CaWRKY40, regulates Ralstonia solanacearum resistance, and confers high-temperature and high-humidity tolerance in pepper.

item.title: CmMAF2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Cluster-17868.118397 Gene Symbol: CmMAF2 Gene Name: AFFECTING FLOWERING 2 Genome: Species: Chrysanthemum morifolium Functional Descriptions: Chrysanthemum MAF2 regulates flowering by repressing gibberellin biosynthesis in response to low temperature.

item.title: CsWAX2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Csa020530 Gene Symbol: CsWAX2 Gene Name: Genome: Cucumber Genome Database (http://cucumber.

item.title: DgTIL1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: DgTIL1 Gene Name: temperature-induced lipocalin-1-like Genome: Species: Chrysanthemum morifolium Functional Descriptions: Identified a temperature-induced lipocalin-1-like gene (DgTIL1) from chrysanthemum and showed that it was notably induced in response to cold stress.

item.title: FvMAPK3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: FvH4_7g15060 Gene Symbol: FvMAPK3 Gene Name: MITOGEN-ACTIVATED PROTEIN KINASE 3 Genome: Fragaria vesca ID (v4.

item.title: GhCKI
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhCKI Gene Name: Gossypium hirsutum Casein kinase I Genome: TM-1 reference genome TM-1 Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: GhCKI DNA methylation are all involved in HT-induced male sterility in cotton.

item.title: GhMYB4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Ghir_A12G003840 Gene Symbol: GhMYB4 Gene Name: Genome: TM-1 reference genome TM-1 Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: In the tapetum of early-stage cotton anthers, upregulated expression of GhMYB4 under HT and overexpressed GhMYB4 under normal temperature both led to severe male sterility phenotypes, coupled with enhanced expression of GhCKI.

item.title: JrGRAS2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: JrGRAS2 Gene Name: GRAS TF 2 Genome: Species: Juglans regia Functional Descriptions: JrGRAS2 improves plant HT tolerance involving in HSP expression.

item.title: McMYB4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: McMYB4 Gene Name: Genome: Malus × domestica genome GDDH13 v 1.

item.title: MdATG18a
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MD11G1303400 Gene Symbol: MdATG18a Gene Name: Genome: Malus × domestica genome GDDH13 v 1.

item.title: MdBBX20
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MDP0000800387 Gene Symbol: MdBBX20 Gene Name: B-box zinc finger protein 20 Genome: Malus × domestica genome GDDH13 v 1.

item.title: MdCBF1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MD07G1262900 Gene Symbol: MdCBF1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: The MdCBF1/MdCBF2-MdTST1/MdTST2 module regulates sugar accumulation in response to low temperature in apple.

item.title: MdCBF2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MD01G1196100 Gene Symbol: MdCBF2 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: The MdCBF1/MdCBF2-MdTST1/MdTST2 module regulates sugar accumulation in response to low temperature in apple.

item.title: MdTST1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MD06G1005100 Gene Symbol: MdTST1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: The MdCBF1/MdCBF2-MdTST1/MdTST2 module regulates sugar accumulation in response to low temperature in apple.

item.title: MdTST2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MD10G1142100 Gene Symbol: MdTST2 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: The MdCBF1/MdCBF2-MdTST1/MdTST2 module regulates sugar accumulation in response to low temperature in apple.

item.title: PuMYB21
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PuMYB21 Gene Name: R2R3-MYB transcription factor 21 Genome: Species: Pyrus ussuriensis Functional Descriptions: PuMYB21 and PuMYB54, from “Nanguo” pears, which were notably expressed in response to cold stress and during the peel-browning process.

item.title: PuMYB54
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PuMYB54 Gene Name: R2R3-MYB transcription factor 21 Genome: Species: Pyrus ussuriensis Functional Descriptions: PuMYB21 and PuMYB54, from “Nanguo” pears, which were notably expressed in response to cold stress and during the peel-browning process.

item.title: SlGRAS4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc01g100200 Gene Symbol: SlGRAS4 Gene Name: GRAS transcription factor 4 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: SlGRAS4 mediates a novel regulatory pathway promoting chilling tolerance in tomato.

item.title: SlMPK1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc12g019460 Gene Symbol: SlMPK1 Gene Name: Genome: Tomato Genome version SL4.

item.title: SlNAC3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc07G063420 Gene Symbol: SlNAC3 Gene Name: NAC transcription factor 3 Genome: Solanum_lycopersicum SL4.
